name: Flying Replicator
description:
It's Flying Replicator aka shitty flying Minecraft! Fly around and spawn cubes in Replicator Mode™, then check 'em out in Free Camera Mode™. Full screen recommended.

Doesn't play so well in the browser so this one is download only.

Controls: WASD moves / flies, SPACE spawns cubes in plane mode, J switches to camera mode, K switches to plane mode

Made in 2 hours
